title: Star Wars Phantom Cut: The Phantom Edit + Attack Of The Phantom
description:
STAR WARS EPISODE 1: THE PHANTOM EDIT


This is it.
The most famous, first one, starting it all SW episode 1 fanedit.
A masterpiece. A milestone. A must-see!


VIDEO DETAILS:

* Aspect Ratio: 16:9
* Resolution: 720x480 Interlaced


AUDIO DETAILS:

* Movie Soundtrack: English 5.1 DOLBY
* Commentaries: English 2.0


PHANTOM DETAILS:

* Original Runtime: 133 min
* New Runtime: 115 min
* Cut/Added: 18 min cut

Cuts removed/added/extended:

* removing or re-editing most scenes featuring Jar-Jar Binks
* limiting redundant exposition throughout film
* trimming reiteration of the politics
* re-arranged shots and scenes matching original trilogy presentation style
* removing "Yippee" and "Oops" from young Anakin's dialog in order to make him a stronger character


-----


STAR WARS EPISODE 2: ATTACK OF THE PHANTOM


The phantom editor strikes again!
Don't miss the brilliant commentary.
This is a very interesting and professionally edited take on ATTACK OF THE CLONES.


VIDEO DETAILS:

* Aspect Ratio: 16:9
* Resolution: 720x480 Interlaced


AUDIO DETAILS:

* Movie Soundtrack: English 5.1 DOLBY
* Commentaries: English 2.0


PHANTOM DETAILS:

* Original Runtime: 142 min
* New Runtime: 104 min
* Cut/Added: 38 min cut

Cuts removed/added/extended:

* lots and lots of cuts and tweaks.
